author: USA TODAY, Cydney Henderson, USA TODAY
title: Bulldog Big Poppa's quarantine sadness lifts Twitter's spirits: 'OMG I need to hug him'
description: It appears many social media users can relate to Big Poppa's sadness, because he was greeted with many words of encouragement and support.
content:
This pup has a hilarious way to avoid going back inside after his walk.
USA TODAY
Quarantine has this bulldog dog tired. 
Big Poppa, the bulldog of Twitter user Rae Elle, is stuck at home like the rest of us, as citizens across the country follow stay-at-h… [+2338 chars]
